blogPost.excerpt: FastPass™ is a free waitlist software where your best customers can pay a fee to skip the line.
blogPost.body: FastPass™ is a free waitlist software where your best customers can pay a fee to skip the line.
blogPost.title: FastPass™ - Let customers pay you to skip the line.
blogPost.author: Aleix Ordeig

localize.description: FastPass™是一款免费的候补名单软件，您最好的客户可以支付一定的费用来跳线。
FastPass™是一款免費的候補名單軟件，您最好的客戶可以支付一定的費用來跳線。

previous.excerpt: With the new Apple Silicon Macs, A lot of people want to know about compatibility for specific apps, however, with thousands of apps that can be run on Mac it can be difficult to know if the app you need is compatible before you buy an Apple Silicon Mac.
previous.title: Apple Silicon App Test - Test your apps for compatibility before you buy an M1 Mac

localize.description: 随着新的苹果Silicon Mac的推出，很多人都想了解特定应用的兼容性，然而，由于Mac上可以运行的应用有数千种，因此在购买苹果Silicon Mac之前，很难知道你需要的应用是否兼容。
localize.tagline: 在购买M1 Mac之前，请测试您的应用程序的兼容性。

localize.description: 隨着新的蘋果Silicon Mac的推出，很多人都想了解特定應用的兼容性，然而，由於Mac上可以運行的應用有數千種，因此在購買蘋果Silicon Mac之前，很難知道你需要的應用是否兼容。
localize.tagline: 在購買M1 Mac之前，請測試您的應用程序的兼容性。
